ref.title: Activity Coefficients at Infinite Dilution for Organic Solutes Dissolved in Three 1-Alkyl-1-methylpyrrolidinium Bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imide Ionic Liquids Bearing Short Linear Alkyl Side Chains of Three to Five Carbons
ref.full: Mutelet, F.; Hassan, E.-S. R. E.; Stephens, T. W.; Acree, Jr., W. E.; Baker, G. A. (2013) J. Chem. Eng. Data 58(8), 2210-2218.
